sentences.sContent: Somewhere a dog suddenly howled, baying at the moon.
sentences.sCn: 某个地方的一只狗突然嗥叫起来，对着月亮狂吠。

words.tran: 咆哮的；极大的；哭哭啼啼的
大声叫喊者；嚎叫的人或动物；滑稽可笑的错误

trans.tranOther: if the wind howls, it makes a loud high sound as it blows
If an animal such as a wolf or a dog howls, it makes a long, loud, crying sound

trans.tranCn: 嗥叫； 呼啸；吼叫； 哀号
trans.tranOther: a loud high sound made by the wind blowing
